articles.content: A Tesla bumper sticker that says 'I bought this before we knew Elon was crazy' keeps popping up on social media. It's prompting a debate about whether you can separate a product from its CEO.Several Redditors mocked the idea of avoiding Tesla because of Elon Musk's controversial reputation. Others said they wouldn't buy one of his EVs.
articles.description: Several Redditors mocked the idea of avoiding Tesla because of Elon Musk's controversial reputation. Others said they wouldn't buy one of his EVs.
articles.risks: Political Risk, Business Risk, Model Risk
articles.tags: Tesla, Elon Musk, Bumper Sticker, Social Media, Redditors, EVs

articles.content: Kelley Blue Book: ‘Dirtier to build but cleaner to drive’: This is how many miles you need to drive an EV to reduce its carbon footprint, study findsWould switching to an electric vehicle reduce your environmental impact? The answer, a new study says, depends on how much you drive.
articles.description: Would switching to an electric vehicle reduce your environmental impact? The answer, a new study says, depends on how much you drive.

articles.title: Kelley Blue Book: ‘Dirtier to build but cleaner to drive’: This is how many miles you need to drive an EV to reduce its carbon footprint, study finds

insight: OKEx is launching a trading competition with a prize pool of over 2 million USDT and a Tesla, which could attract traders to the crypto exchange. Investor sentiment towards Tesla may be declining due to recent controversy surrounding its CEO, Elon Musk. On the other hand, Dogecoin has seen incredible success due to endorsements from Musk and investor Mark iCuban. Additionally, switching to an electric vehicle could reduce environmental impact, depending on how much you drive.
